{{Infobox battle item |name = Collecteur de Jetons |image = [[File:Bag_Token_Collector_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork du ''Collecteur de Jetons''. |price = 1000 {{pdollar}} |location =
*[[Token Collector#Shops|Shops]] *[[Token Collector#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == Le '''Collecteur de Jetons''' est un type d'objet de combat. Il augmente temporairement le taux d'obtention des [[Jetons de Donjon]] de 50% pour 30 secondes. == Détails == Bonus de +50% aux [[Jetons de Donjon]] gagné == Obtention == ===Magasins=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Objets de combat}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Argenta]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Cramois'Île]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Île Sevii 3]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Île 7 de Sevii]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Mauville]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Ébènelle]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Clémenti-ville]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Autéquia]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Algatia]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Pacifiville]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Féli-Cité]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Verchamps]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Frimapic]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Ondes-sur-Mer]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Vaguelone]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Papeloa]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Neuvartault]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Port Tempères]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Ekaeka]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Village Flottant]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Centre Commercial]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} |} |} ===Donjons=== {{Loot/head‎|Objets de combat}} {{LootItem|Mt.
